    • Uses of Relation in gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem

      Classes in gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem that implement Relation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractRelation
      The basic implementation of the Relation interface.
      class  Conjunction
      Represents a multiplicity of semantic items.
      class  Event
      Implementation of an event, essentially a predicate-argument structure where arguments (participants) have semantic roles.
      class  ImplicitRelation
      Implementation of a relation that is implicit; in other words, there are no predicates that indicate the relation.
      class  Modification
      Represents an attribute of a semantic item.
      class  Predication
      A generalized predicate-argument structure.
      Methods in gov.nih.nlm.ling.sem that return types with arguments of type Relation

      Constructs a RelationDefinition object, with a type, relation class, core and optional argument information.
